Source.Name: baselayout
Source.Description: baselayout creates the Pardus Linux main filesystem hierarchy.

Update.Comment: Add svxlink user. Add it into dialout, daemon, and audio groups. (pb#18672)
Update.Name: Eren Türkay

Update.Comment: Lowercase the first letter of species name.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Add ecryptfs group, drop duplicate partimag users and groups.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: - Add more directories according to FHS 2.3, - Update services and protocols file, - Drop mime.types and mailcap which were outdated, - Fix inittab so that single runlevel works as expected, - Add pardus-release as an additional file.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Add VDR user and group, patch by Özge Barbaros.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Add partimage user and group entries
Update.Name: Fatih Arslan

Update.Comment: Fix usbmuxd group homedir and login parameters
Update.Name: İnanç Yıldırgan

Update.Comment: Add a terrible hack to workaround zemberek preremove exceptions.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Add wireshark group in order to prevent wireshark from running as root.
Update.Name: H. İbrahim Güngör

Update.Comment: Add rpc user and group for rpcbind daemon.
Update.Name: H. İbrahim Güngör

Update.Comment: Enable nf_conntrack_acct and increment inotify.max_user_watches to 512k
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: - New release - Create lib32 directories on x86_64
Update.Name: Fatih Aşıcı

Update.Comment: - Enable core_used_pid kernel parameter, - Add lock group for systemd var-lock mounts, - Update services and protocols files from fedora, - Refactor postInstall script, - Migrate to standard UNIX groups.
Update.Name: Fatih Aşıcı

Update.Comment: Change sshd home directory from /dev/null to /var/empty/sshd.
Update.Name: H. İbrahim Güngör

Update.Comment: Fix avahi user's home directory, add avahi-autoipd user/group
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Add jackuser group for RT jackaudio.
Update.Name: H. İbrahim Güngör

Update.Comment: Add KDM group to fix KDM startup of KDE 4.5
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Add kvm and qemu groups, add qemu user.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Don't remove users with no passwords from shadow database
Update.Name: Bahadır Kandemir

Update.Comment: Add /lib64 symlink on x86_64 for binary blobs built on multi-lib systems
Update.Name: Fatih Aşıcı

Update.Comment: Add user and group for usbmuxd.
Update.Name: İnanç Yıldırgan

Update.Comment: - Add qemu and kvm users/groups for libvirtd, - Don't fail if polkit doesn't exist or can't revoke authorizations when deleting users.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: hyphen is a valid character for a username too
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: - Link /usr/share/autostart to /etc/xdg/autostart for Corporate2, - Fix paths according to KDE3.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Fixed random.choice() raising exception when input set is empty.
Update.Name: Bahadır Kandemir

Update.Comment: Check face icon dir before scanning.
Update.Name: Bahadır Kandemir

Update.Comment: Set random face icon when creating new users.
Update.Name: Bahadır Kandemir

Update.Comment: Remove locate group before migrating. There was a typo in there.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Add user and group for memcached.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: "*" can be passed to User.Manager.{grant,revoke,block}Authorization(uid, action) as action to grant/revoke/block all.
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Don't bell on tab completion Set ld.so.conf paths of Qt and KDE to 4 Remove /dev/pts and /dev/shm folder creation
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Introduce a common group for virtualization needs.
Update.Name: Ekin Meroğlu

Update.Comment: Fixed User.Manager.userInfo() method not raising exception for missing users.
Update.Name: Bahadır Kandemir

Update.Comment: Add /sbin and /usr/sbin to user path, see bug #7704
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Remove flashplugin hack that disables hardware acceleration in Flash Player
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: kpdf is changed to okular in mailcap file.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: - Make COMAR scripts pychecker clean, - Add dash to the allowed characters for a group name, - Use hashlib instead of md5, - Add gnokii user and group for the SMS daemon.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Add vboxusers group and vboxadd user
Update.Name: Fatih Aşıcı

Update.Comment: slocate wants to have a locate group instead of slocate.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Change release to 2009 prealpha and takeover
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Remove unused elements in groups and users list
Update.Name: Burak Çalışkan

Update.Comment: Add .macromedia dir and configuration file to skel to disable hardware acceleration and fix Nvidia crash in Firefox
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: * quassel, bitlbee and italc groups added * quasselcore and bitlbee users added
Update.Name: H. İbrahim Güngör

Update.Comment: Remove duplicated svn entry from group list
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: * Added user and group of svn * Add apache user to svn group
Update.Name: Ahmet AYGÜN

Update.Comment: - Use pisitools.insinto for compatibility between python 2.5 and 2.6 - Tidy up actions.py - Don't use reserved python words like file
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: - Add mediatomb user and group, - Add PulseAudio related users and groups.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Fixed deault search domain not setting properly.
Update.Name: Bahadır Kandemir

Update.Comment: Fixed getSearchDomain() raising an exception when /etc/resolv.default.conf is missing.
Update.Name: Bahadır Kandemir

Update.Comment: Merged new Network.Stack script. Fixes DNS problems.
Update.Name: Bahadır Kandemir

Update.Comment: Add polkit and hal users to shadow
Update.Name: Bahadır Kandemir

Update.Comment: Add partimag user and partimag group to package.py
Update.Name: Fahri Tuğrul Gürkaynak

Update.Comment: Remove all auths before adding positive or negative auth
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Use new Pardus nameserver as third one in resolv.conf
Update.Name: Ekin Meroğlu

Update.Comment: Create polkit group, then user in postinstall
Update.Name: Bahadır Kandemir

Update.Comment: Fix polkit group,user deletion process in postinstall
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: COMAR models added for PolicyKit authorization management
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Sync with SVN, remove gtk settings from skel
Update.Name: Ekin Meroğlu

Update.Comment: Fix addUser and addGroup methods' auto id behaviour
Update.Name: Bahadır Kandemir

Update.Comment: Fix recursive profile reading, which triggers noglob bash bug/feature
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Do not set noglob twice by sourcing bashrc twice, revert profile back to .sh/.csh style
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Update stack.py to add search line to /etc/resolv.conf from dhcpcd
Update.Name: Faik Uygur

Update.Comment: Add ups user and ups group to package.py
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Make sure Language tag is changed in package.py
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: usermgr comar script: numbers are ok in usernames, i18n
Update.Name: Gürer Özen

Update.Comment: Release bump to include newest stack.py
Update.Name: Gürer Özen

Update.Comment: ntp user/group added to package, requested by AEK
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: Update issue, move resolv.conf to special files
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Add fstab as a patch, till next release
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Change PostgreSQL's defaults as AEK's requested
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: Revert last, use postInstall as Gürersan requested
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: passwd/group cleanup, remove old bash script and use postInstall instead, add users/groups with COMAR
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: Fix exception and update env command
Update.Name: Gürer Özen

Update.Comment: New comar script for user manager
Update.Name: Gürer Özen
